A mụrụ Sajet na Naijiria ma zụlite ya na Australia site na afọ anọ, ọ bụ nwa amaala Netherlands. O nwere nzere doctorate na ọmụmụ liberal studies site na Mahadum Georgetown, nzere masta na akụkọ ihe mere mgbe chie site na Bryn Mawr College, nzere masters na nchịkwa azụmaahịa, na nzere bachelọ na akụkọ ihe mere mgbe ochie na Mahadụ Melbourne, na diplọma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ọmụmụ ihe ngosi nka na Mahadwa Deakin.
Malite na Eprel 1, 2013, Sajet jere ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke Smithsonian's National Portrait Gallery na Washington D.C

Ọrụ a na-esote oge ọ bụ onye isi na onye isi oche nke Historical Society nke Pennsylvania. Tupu ọrụ ahụ, ọ bụ osote onye nduzi nke Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts ma nọrọ oge dị ka onye nlekọta na onye nduzi na ụlọ ngosi nka abụọ nke Australia.
